item.title: Sound Interior Mais Loud 1.50.x ETS2
item.description:
Sound Interior Mais Loud 1.50.x ETS2

Sound Interior Mais Loud
Compatible with version 1.50.x
The mod increases the sound inside the truck
Improves rear view vision
Changes the transition of the headlight from direct red to green
Flashing Lighthouse from 22:00 until 5:00
And it makes traffic more intense, more likely to get into traffic jams.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: AITraffic Vehicle Skins Pack v0.4 ETS2
item.description:
AITraffic Vehicle Skins Pack v0.4 ETS2

All paint jobs are freely invented and created with the help of AI.
This mod has no real companies.
The Skin Pack includes paint jobs for:
VW Crafter , Transporter
Ford Transit , Ford Transit 2016
Fiat Ducato Box , Fiat Ducato
Isuzu _Reefer
Iveco Daily Tow , Iveco Daily Curtain , Iveco Daily Box
Peugeot 208 , Peugeot Boxer Dumper
Renault Clio
Citroen 2cv
Tedom Fox Cistern
Temsa_ Opaline
Bus Tourliner
v.0.4 80 Paintwork and New models
tested 1.50
By Joker



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: The Godfather’s Standalone Pack 1 v1.2 ATS
item.description:
The Godfather’s Standalone Pack 1 v1.2 ATS

The Godfather’s ATS Standalone Pack 1 v1.2
The Godfather’s Mods Company Brings to you a whole new Rework of our Freight Market Packs with a new era and new name as the game has changed with this pack now our Standalone Traffic pack 1 witch brings a whole heaps of new style Standalone Trailers to the pack with Curtainsiders To Box Trailers To Fuel Tankers to Grain Trailers and lots of formations from. Flatbeds/DropDecks/DryVans/Insulated/Reefers/FuelTankers/Grainhoppers in 28ft/45ft/50ft/43ft/48ft & 53ft formats the pack has it all and is now got a grand total of 300 Paintjobs of Real Companys & Real Brands from around the world with both Trailer & Truck combos witch have never been done before in any of my ai tarffic or fright market packs until now…

v1.0 Released April 2024
This is the launch edition of our rework of our Freight Market packs now known as the Standalone Trailers packs this our 1st pack and done with the new
2024 v1 edition of Mod Studio 2 pro edition plus we have matching Truck Paintjobs to go with each trailer in the pack..

v1.1 Update (15th May 2024)
This update is to make the pack work with the brand new 1.50x update of ATS and the games new Gaming Engine.

v1.2 Update (July 30th 2024)
This Update Brings 80 new paintjob Skins for the Standalone Freight Market Trailers that also Spawn into the Ai Traffic Flow and Freight Market jobs and World Of Trucks
Freight Market Jobs at random.. with New skins for the 28ft & 53ft SCS Box Trailers and 53ft SCS Fuel Tankers the pack is now got a total of 300 paintjob skins that spawn at random.
All The Skins in this pack are built by The Godfather’s Mods Company and holds all rights to the skins in this pack if used on your Livestreams or uploaded videos on any platform of streaming or Media u must give credit to The Godfather’s Mods Company..



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Kassbohrer Maxima XS v1.2 ETS2
item.description:
Kassbohrer Maxima XS v1.2 ETS2

The trailer includes:
– Skins
– High quality 3D model
– Completely autonomous
– Baked AO
– Trailer Cables
– Template (inside the mod)
– Coloring in any color
– Cables
– Mod adapted for 1.50
